readable.title: 3604928725_58147c87cd
readable.content: A child floating on a blue raft while a woman holds on to him while a black dog swims nearby . Black dog swims behind two people on an inflatable blue raft . Two people and a dog play in the water using a blue inflatable toy . Two people swimming in water with a black dog trailing behind them . Two people swimming on a floating while a black dog follows .
